meanings: Noun 머리에 웨이브를 만드는 도구, 미용사
꽃 위에서 펄럭이며 날고 있는 나비

vlive.korean: [몬엑 7호가 흔들리고 있다] 한 명이 아니었어요. [MONSTA X no. 7 is wavering] It wasn't one of them. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : MONSTA X-RAY 3 (몬스타엑스레이 3) 8화 예고
vlive.english: [MONSTA X no. 7 is wavering] It wasn't one of them.

vlive.korean: 발 바꿔서 오른발. - 나이스. [JUNGKOOK takes a step at a time without wavering] - Change your foot. Right foot. - Nice. 듣기 View video V Special : [꽃브로] MINWOO & JUNGKOOK EP3. "Who's the daredevil?"
vlive.english: [JUNGKOOK takes a step at a time without wavering] - Change your foot. Right foot. - Nice.

vlive.korean: [주헌 / 몬엑 6호] 진짜 흔들렸어요 날 너무 힘들게 했어요. [Jooheon/ MONSTA X no.6] I really wavered. He made it really tough for me. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : MONSTA X-RAY 3 (몬스타엑스레이 3) 8화 예고
vlive.english: [Jooheon/ MONSTA X no.6] I really wavered. He made it really tough for me.

vlive.korean: [흔들리지 않을 거야...] - 이게 센 게 아니에요? - 하나도 안 세요. [I'm not going to waver...] - This isn't the strong one? - It's not at all. 듣기 View video 한뼘TV : [방판소년단 EP28] 유재환, 폴 댄스 아카데미에서 돌다가 진짜 돌아... (말잇못)
vlive.english: [I'm not going to waver...] - This isn't the strong one? - It's not at all.

vlive.korean: 회사가 부유한 건 절대 흔들리지 않는다는 얘기예요. The fact that they're well-off means that they won't waver. 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : [FULL] Lovelyz 3rd MINI Album [Fall in Lovelyz] Comeback Showcase
vlive.english: The fact that they're well-off means that they won't waver.

examples.korean: She’s wavering between buying a house in the city or moving away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 시내에 집을 사느냐 멀리 이사를 가느냐 하는 사이에서 결정을 못 내리고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s wavering between buying a house in the city or moving away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He's wavering on whether to change jobs or not. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 직장을 바꿀지 말지 망설이고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: He's wavering on whether to change jobs or not. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Kerosene lamps issued a smoky wavering light. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 등유 램프에서 나오는 불빛은 흐릿하게 흔들거렸다. Neungyule
examples.english: Kerosene lamps issued a smoky wavering light. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He is wavering between two options. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 두 가지 안을 놓고 망설이고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: He is wavering between two options. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her mind is wavering between moving and not moving out into the countryside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 시골로 이사 가는 것을 주저하고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: Her mind is wavering between moving and not moving out into the countryside. Add to Wordbook
